commit_list.message:
Fixed module to work standalone

In this commit, install_spde_dev will now complete a Puppet Master
install with the code manager hocon setting 'authenticate_webhook' =
false as needed with particular client.

Major fixes

This module kinda worked prior.  Added much of the needed elements to
getting Code Manager working and the install working consistenly.

Fixed mismatches manifests files

There was an issue with manifests files differing from
modules/pe_install/manifests file and that can't happen.

Added pe_install::hocon class

Needed to separate pe_install::hocon class to solve chicken and egg
problem.

Updates to pe_install

This commit allows pe_hocon_settings run to occur after standalone PE
Master install

Fixed node group issue

Issue with node groups 'Production environment' and 'Agent-specified
environment' were due to improper elements specified in the rules.
Fixed now.
First commit

First commit

This is my first commit of the control repo that contains roles,
profiles, hieradata, environment.conf, site.pp (classification), and
scripts for getting commit versions to show on Puppet agent runs.
